name: 222-32 swing by spring top
sizes_available: s – m – l – xl – xxl – xxxl
notes:
knitted jumper in drops belle. piece is knitted top down with round yoke, lace pattern, leaf pattern and short balloon sleeves. pattern vs-078; yarn group b

**size**: s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl

**materials**:
drops belle from garnstudio
250-300-300-350-350-400 g colour 02, off white

**knitting tension**:
21 stitches in width and 28 rows vertically in stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm.

**needles**:
drops double pointed needles size 4 mm
drops circular needle size 4 mm, length 40 and 60 or 80 cm for stocking stitch.
drops double pointed needles size 3 mm
drops circular needle size 3 mm, length 40 cm and 80 cm for edges.
